c74object.name: hoa.3d.decoder~
c74object.description: hoa.3d.decoder~ decodes an ambisonics soundfield for several loudspeakers configuration or for headphones. First argument is the ambisonic order of decomposition, the second one is the number of channels.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.description: First argument is the ambisonic order of decomposition.

objarg.name: number-of-channels
objarg.description: Second argument is the number of channels

method.name: signal
method.digest: Array of spherical harmonic signals to decode for a set of loudspeakers
method.description: Array of spherical harmonic signals to decode for a set of loudspeakers

attribute.name: angles
attribute.description: Set the angles of each channels in degrees. The angles of channels are only settable in irregular mode. Each angles are in degrees, wrapped between 0. and 360. You must specify 2 values per channel corresponding to the azimuth value followed by the elevation value.

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description:
There is two decoding mode :
Ambisonics : for a standard or irregular loudspeakers repartition over a sphere.
Binaural : for headphones.

attribute.name: offset
attribute.description: Set the offsets of channels with a list of 2 float values corresponding to the azimuth and elevation offset, in degrees between 0. and 360.

attribute.name: pinna
attribute.description: The pinna size to use for the binaural restitution. The pinna message followed by the symbol small or large set the pinna size of the HRTF responses for the binaural restitution. Choose the one that suits you best.
